name: a die and a death
description:
fullscreen recommended; make sure you click on the game window to focus it!

talk to strange creatures and test your luck and see if you can survive against fate! everyone in this strange place has been sentenced to face the Great Die. Some will survive, many won't.  Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - move

SPACE - talk

Cast of Characters:
  • mister nice ~ a charming chap that welcomes you to "a place"
  • levi ~ a lonely soul who's lost his sister
  • sandy ~ a little girl that practices the splits while sleeping
  • miss shakescube ~ an aspiring playwright that loves a certain prologue
  • kevin ~ a fun dude that's way too excited about his terrible odds
  • sketchy boi ~ visit this sketchy figure before entering The Room to see your odds
  • the three dice ~ three rulers of this realm, they run the Ceremony of the Great Die
  • and a whole 3 more!!! (wow!)
Outsourced Materials
